showScoreExcerpt:
Theresa Rebeck’s I Need That is a three-hander that you can imagine as an extended pilot for a CBS dramedy. Rebeck doesn’t dig too deep into the psychology of her characters, but the surface charms are more than enough to sustain a dramedy that runs about 100 minutes. After all, this is the kind of old-fashioned entertainment where it’s best not to question too deeply why these characters have waited so long to express themselves as openly as they do here. Ray
